content.question: Which of the following best exemplifies the diffusion of popular culture throughout the world in contemporary society?

choices.label: The increasing popularity of a fashion trend that originates in a large city, such as New York, and spreads to small rural towns
The spread of an Internet meme via social media applications
The spread of a religion through the migration of adherents of the religion
The increasing popularity of a new band that spends a year touring cities around the world
The spread of new slang that becomes widely used in government-funded schools

content.answer: The spread of an Internet meme via social media applications

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain spatial relationships across various geographic scales using geographic concepts, processes, models, or theories.
